title: Boardroom Baby Surprise
description: When pregnant Morgan Stevens arrives at wealthy businessman Bryan Caliborn's office looking for her baby's father, two things become she's mistaken him for his late brother and she's in labor―in the boardroom!Now Morgan's a single mom, and she's bowled over by the take-charge tycoon's support. But surely the once-burned bachelor is just doing it out of duty….
author: Jackie Braun
